private def lensCoord (g : Expr → M Expr) (n : Nat) (e : Expr) : M Expr := do
  match n, e with
  | 0, .app f a         =&gt; return e.updateApp! (← g f) a
  | 1, .app f a         =&gt; return e.updateApp! f (← g a)
  | 0, .lam _ y b _     =&gt; return e.updateLambdaE! (← g y) b
  | 1, .lam n y b c     =&gt; withLocalDecl n c y fun x =&gt; do mkLambdaFVars #[x] &lt;|← g &lt;| b.instantiateRev #[x]
  | 0, .forallE _ y b _ =&gt; return e.updateForallE! (← g y) b
  | 1, .forallE n y b c =&gt; withLocalDecl n c y fun x =&gt; do mkForallFVars #[x] &lt;|← g &lt;| b.instantiateRev #[x]
  | 0, .letE _ y a b _  =&gt; return e.updateLet! (← g y) a b
  | 1, .letE _ y a b _  =&gt; return e.updateLet! y (← g a) b
  | 2, .letE n y a b _  =&gt; withLetDecl n y a fun x =&gt; do mkLetFVars #[x] &lt;|← g &lt;| b.instantiateRev #[x]
  | 0, .proj _ _ b      =&gt; e.updateProj! &lt;$&gt; g b
  | n, .mdata _ a       =&gt; e.updateMData! &lt;$&gt; lensCoord g n a
  | 3, _                =&gt; throwError "Lensing on types is not supported"
  | c, e                =&gt; throwError "Invalid coordinate {c} for {e}"</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">private def lensAux (g : Expr → M Expr) : List Nat → Expr → M Expr
  | [], e =&gt; g e
  | head::tail, e =&gt; lensCoord (lensAux g tail) head e</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Run the given </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">replace</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> function to replace the expression at the subexpression position. If the subexpression is below a binder
the bound variables will be appropriately instantiated with free variables and reabstracted after the replacement.
If the subexpression is invalid or points to a type then this will throw. -/
def replaceSubexpr (replace : (subexpr : Expr) → M Expr) (p : Pos) (root : Expr) : M Expr :=
  lensAux replace p.toArray.toList root</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Runs </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">k</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> on the given coordinate, including handling binders properly.
The subexpression value passed to </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">k</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> is not instantiated with respect to the
array of free variables. -/
private def viewCoordAux (k : Array Expr → Expr → M α) (fvars: Array Expr) (n : Nat) (e : Expr) : M α := do
  match n, e with
  | 3, _                =&gt; throwError "Internal: Types should be handled by viewAux"
  | 0, .app f _         =&gt; k fvars f
  | 1, .app _ a         =&gt; k fvars a
  | 0, .lam _ y _ _     =&gt; k fvars y
  | 1, .lam n y b c     =&gt; withLocalDecl n c (y.instantiateRev fvars) fun x =&gt; k (fvars.push x) b
  | 0, .forallE _ y _ _ =&gt; k fvars y
  | 1, .forallE n y b c =&gt; withLocalDecl n c (y.instantiateRev fvars) fun x =&gt; k (fvars.push x) b
  | 0, .letE _ y _ _ _  =&gt; k fvars y
  | 1, .letE _ _ a _ _  =&gt; k fvars a
  | 2, .letE n y a b _  =&gt; withLetDecl n (y.instantiateRev fvars) (a.instantiateRev fvars) fun x =&gt; k (fvars.push x) b
  | 0, .proj _ _ b      =&gt; k fvars b
  | n, .mdata _ a       =&gt; viewCoordAux k fvars n a
  | c, e                =&gt; throwError "Invalid coordinate {c} for {e}"</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">private def viewAux (k : Array Expr → Expr → M α) (fvars : Array Expr) : List Nat → Expr → M α
  | [],         e =&gt; k fvars &lt;| e.instantiateRev fvars
  | 3::tail,    e =&gt; do
    let y ← inferType &lt;| e.instantiateRev fvars
    viewAux (fun otherFvars =&gt; k (fvars ++ otherFvars)) #[] tail y
  | head::tail, e =&gt; viewCoordAux (fun fvars =&gt; viewAux k fvars tail) fvars head e</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus   (visit : (fvars : Array Expr) → (subexpr : Expr) → M α)
  (p : Pos) (root : Expr) :  M α :=
   viewAux visit #[] p.toArray.toList root</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">private def foldAncestorsAux
  (k : Array Expr → Expr → Nat → α → M α)
  (acc : α) (address : List Nat) (fvars : Array Expr) (current : Expr) : M α :=
  match address with
  | [] =&gt; return acc
  | 3 :: tail =&gt; do
    let current := current.instantiateRev fvars
    let y ← inferType current
    let acc ← k fvars current 3 acc
    foldAncestorsAux (fun otherFvars =&gt; k (fvars ++ otherFvars)) acc tail #[] y
  | head :: tail =&gt; do
    let acc ← k fvars (current.instantiateRev fvars) head acc
    viewCoordAux (foldAncestorsAux k acc tail) fvars head current</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">foldAncestors k init p e</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> folds over the strict ancestor subexpressions of the given expression </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">e</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> above position </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">p</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">, starting at the root expression and working down.
The fold function </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">k</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> is given the newly instantiated free variables, the ancestor subexpression, and the coordinate
that will be explored next.-/
def foldAncestors
  (k : (fvars: Array Expr) → (subexpr : Expr) → (nextCoord : Nat) → α → M α)
  (init : α) (p : Pos) (e : Expr) : M α :=
  foldAncestorsAux k init p.toArray.toList #[] e</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">end r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">section ViewRaw</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">variable [Monad M] [MonadError M]</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Get the raw subexpression without performing any instantiation. -/
private def viewCoordRaw (e : Expr) (n : Nat) : M Expr := do
  match e, n with
  | e,                3 =&gt; throwError "Can't viewRaw the type of {e}"
  | .app f _,         0 =&gt; pure f
  | .app _ a,         1 =&gt; pure a
  | .lam _ y _ _,     0 =&gt; pure y
  | .lam _ _ b _,     1 =&gt; pure b
  | .forallE _ y _ _, 0 =&gt; pure y
  | .forallE _ _ b _, 1 =&gt; pure b
  | .letE _ y _ _ _,  0 =&gt; pure y
  | .letE _ _ a _ _,  1 =&gt; pure a
  | .letE _ _ _ b _,  2 =&gt; pure b
  | .proj _ _ b,      0 =&gt; pure b
  | .mdata _ a,       n =&gt; viewCoordRaw a n
  | e,                c =&gt; throwError "Bad coordinate {c} for {e}"</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Given a valid </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">SubExpr</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">, return the raw current expression without performing any instantiation.
If the given </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">SubExpr</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> has a type subexpression coordinate, then throw an error.</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">This is a cheaper version of </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">Lean.Meta.viewSubexpr</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> and can be used to quickly view the
subexpression at a position. Note that because the resulting expression may contain
loose bound variables it can't be used in any </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">MetaM</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> methods. -/
def viewSubexpr (p : Pos) (root : Expr) : M Expr :=
  p.foldlM viewCoordRaw root</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">private def viewBindersCoord : Nat → Expr → Option (Name × Expr)
  | 1, .lam n y _ _     =&gt; some (n, y)
  | 1, .forallE n y _ _ =&gt; some (n, y)
  | 2, .letE n y _ _ _  =&gt; some (n, y)
  | _, _                =&gt; none</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">viewBinders p e</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> returns a list of all of the binders (name, type) above the given position </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">p</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> in the root expression </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">e</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> -/
def viewBinders (p : Pos) (root : Expr) : M (Array (Name × Expr)) := do
  let (acc, _) ← p.foldlM (init := (#[], root)) fun (acc, e) c =&gt; do
    let e₂ ← viewCoordRaw e c
    let acc :=
      match viewBindersCoord c e with
      | none =&gt; acc
      | some b =&gt; acc.push b
    return (acc, e₂)
  return acc</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Returns the number of binders above a given subexpr position. -/
def numBinders (p : Pos) (e : Expr) : M Nat :=
  Array.size &lt;$&gt; viewBinders p e</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">end ViewRaw</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1x3r274 r-p1pxzi"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">end Lean.Core</span></span></span></span>

-- It exploits the fact that a small enum compiles to </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">uint8</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">.
@[extern "lean_uint8_to_uint64"]

  | .default        =&gt; 0
  | .implicit       =&gt; 1

    : Expr.Data :=

  reprPrec v prec := Id.run do

    if v.approxDepth != 0 then

    if v.hasFVar then

    if v.hasExprMVar then
      r := r ++ " (hasExprMVar := " ++ toString v.hasExprMVar ++ ")"
    if v.hasLevelMVar then
      r := r ++ " (hasLevelMVar := " ++ toString v.hasLevelMVar ++ ")"
    Repr.addAppParen r prec</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">open Expr</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/--

This is a persistent data structure implemented using red-black trees. -/

  deriving Inhabited, EmptyCollection</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">instance : ForIn m FVarIdSet FVarId := inferInstanceAs (ForIn _ (RBTree ..) ..)</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">def FVarIdSet.insert (s : FVarIdSet) (fvarId : FVarId) : FVarIdSet :=

  | proj (typeName : Name) (idx : Nat) (struct : Expr)
with
  @[computed_field, extern "lean_expr_data"]
  data : @&amp; Expr → Data
    | .const n lvls =&gt; mkData (mixHash 5 &lt;| mixHash (hash n) (hash lvls)) 0 0 false false (lvls.any Level.hasMVar) (lvls.any Level.hasParam)
    | .bvar idx =&gt; mkData (mixHash 7 &lt;| hash idx) (idx+1)

    | .mvar fvarId =&gt; mkData (mixHash 17 &lt;| hash fvarId) 0 0 false true
    | .mdata _m e =&gt;

        (max t.data.looseBVarRange.toNat (b.data.looseBVarRange.toNat - 1))
        d
        (t.data.hasFVar || b.data.hasFVar)
        (t.data.hasExprMVar || b.data.hasExprMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelMVar || b.data.hasLevelMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelParam || b.data.hasLevelParam)
    | .forallE _ t b _ =&gt;
      let d := (max t.data.approxDepth.toUInt32 b.data.approxDepth.toUInt32) + 1

        (max t.data.looseBVarRange.toNat (b.data.looseBVarRange.toNat - 1))
        d
        (t.data.hasFVar || b.data.hasFVar)
        (t.data.hasExprMVar || b.data.hasExprMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelMVar || b.data.hasLevelMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelParam || b.data.hasLevelParam)
    | .letE _ t v b _ =&gt;
      let d := (max (max t.data.approxDepth.toUInt32 v.data.approxDepth.toUInt32) b.data.approxDepth.toUInt32) + 1

        (max (max t.data.looseBVarRange.toNat v.data.looseBVarRange.toNat) (b.data.looseBVarRange.toNat - 1))
        d
        (t.data.hasFVar || v.data.hasFVar || b.data.hasFVar)
        (t.data.hasExprMVar || v.data.hasExprMVar || b.data.hasExprMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelMVar || v.data.hasLevelMVar || b.data.hasLevelMVar)
        (t.data.hasLevelParam || v.data.hasLevelParam || b.data.hasLevelParam)

@[inline] def getAppArgsN (e : Expr) (n : Nat) : Array Expr :=
  let dummy := mkSort levelZero
  loop n e (mkArray n dummy)
where
  loop : Nat → Expr → Array Expr → Array Expr
    | 0,   _,        as =&gt; as
    | i+1, .app f a, as =&gt; loop i f (as.set! i a)

def stripArgsN (e : Expr) (n : Nat) : Expr :=
  match n, e with

def getAppPrefix (e : Expr) (n : Nat) : Expr :=

def traverseApp {M} [Monad M]

  e.withApp fun fn args =&gt; mkAppN &lt;$&gt; f fn &lt;*&gt; args.mapM f</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">@[specialize] private def withAppRevAux (k : Expr → Array Expr → α) : Expr → Array Expr → α
  | app f a, as =&gt; withAppRevAux k f (as.push a)
  | f,       as =&gt; k f as</span></span></span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1adg3ll r-1g7jtus r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">/-- Same as </span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-dyfej2 r-z2wwpe r-15gepa6 r-1471scf r-1aiqnjv r-1hq4qhi r-16dba41 r-ilng1c r-trst2h r-1noe1sz r-njp1lv"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3">withApp</span></span><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3 r-1x3r274"><span class="css-1jxf684 r-bcqeeo r-1ttztb7 r-qvutc0 r-poiln3"> but with arguments reversed. -/
